name: Test_gemfile_lock_file
description: You can test your rubygems applications for issues according to their lockfile using this action. It takes a JSON object containing a the "target" `Gemfile.lock`.

encoding.description: the encoding for the manifest files sent.

target.description: the `Gemfile.lock` file, encoded according the the "encoding" field.

contents.description: the contents of `Gemfile.lock` as a string.
